# API Documentation

## Interfaces

| Interface                           | Description            |
| ----------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| [Listener](./Listener.md)           | Callback listener      |
| [ProviderProps](./ProviderProps.md) |                        |
| [Store](./Store.md)                 | Mutik Store            |
| [UpdaterFn](./UpdaterFn.md)         | Mutik updater function |

## Functions

| Function                          | Description                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [createStore](./createStore_1.md) | Create a Mutik `store` given some initial state. The `store` can be used in or out of React. |
| [Provider](./Provider_1.md)       | Mutik context provider.                                                                      |
| [useSelector](./useSelector_1.md) | React hook to subscribe to Mutik state. Must be called underneath a Mutik .                  |
